=== About ===
The IRC Council are represent Ubuntus presents on IRC and report to the CommunityCouncil, the <nowiki>[[IRC-IrcCouncil-Charter|IRC Council charter]]</nowiki> describes the council in more detail.

Current council members are listed on the <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/~irc-council|Launchpad team]]</nowiki>.

=== Responsibilities ===
The IRC Council are directly responsible for the management of the <nowiki>[[IRC-IrcTeam-Scope|Core Ubuntu IRC channels]]</nowiki> on <nowiki>[[http://freenode.net/|freenode]]</nowiki>, as well as managing the <nowiki>[[IRC-IrcTeam|IRC operators]]</nowiki> for <nowiki>[[IRC-IrcTeam-Scope|Core channels]]</nowiki>, and appointing new operators. Management of <nowiki>[[Teams|team]]</nowiki> and LoCo channels is is generally left to the respective teams, thought the IRC Council have ultimate responsibility for those channels and can, if required, take control of those channels. The IRC Council also have a final say in conflicts as described in the <nowiki>[[IRC-AppealProcess|Appeal Process]]</nowiki>.

=== Meetings ===
The IRC Council holds regular <nowiki>[[IRC-IrcCouncil-MeetingAgenda|meetings]]</nowiki> in #ubuntu-meeting.
